details.top: The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) used to say between the Yemeni corner and the black stone:
details.arabic_diacless: ربنا اٰتنا في الدنيا حسنة وفي الاٰخرة حسـنة وقنا عذاب النار
details.arabic: رَبَّنَآ اٰتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَّفِي الْاٰخِرَةِ حَسَـنَةً وَّقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
details.transliteration: Rabbanaa 'aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-'aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa 'a<u>th</u>aaban-naar.
details.translations: Our Lord, grant us the good things in this world and the good things in the next life and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
details.reference: Al-Bukhari, cf. Al-Asqalani, Fathul-Bari 11/171, Muslim 4/2007. The wording in Muslim's report is: 'make it a purification for him and a source of mercy.

pageTitle: Between the Yemeni corner and black stone [Ka'bah]
